author: nc1234
content: Hey all, this is my dev update from last week. Excited to be part of this program and hope to contribute once I am up to speed! https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/pull/75

content: I hope to connect with mentor <@539495253418180618> and <@602753420033785856> to learn more about light client and CL reward API and how I can help

author: mariohavel
content: The weekly standup call starts in an hour, folks! If you would like to share your progress with others, chat about projects and current issues, please join us at https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-standup

author: echo_alice
content:

content: No worries, these calls repeat every week. Each participant had a chance to give an update on his work. You can find all of that in dev updates doc https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-zero/blob/main/development-updates.md
